## obj2FormData variable

Object 转为 FormData

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
obj2FormData: (obj: Object, ...ignoreKeys: string[]) => FormData
```

## Example

const obj = { a: 1, b: 2, c: 3 }<!-- -->; const formData = obj2FormData(obj, 'b');
